Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.cache.spi.CacheTransactionSynchronization

  • Packages that use CacheTransactionSynchronization 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.cache.internal
    Internal implementations and support for second-level caching.
    org.hibernate.cache.spi
    Defines the integration aspect of Hibernate's second-level caching, allowing a "caching backend" to be plugged in as a cache provider.
    org.hibernate.engine.spi
    This package defines some central internal SPI abstractions used throughout the implementation of Hibernate.
    org.hibernate.internal
    An internal package containing implementations of central Hibernate APIs, mostly defined in org.hibernate.
